title: Add PDF Annotation Extraction Support

specification.description: Implement extraction of PDF annotations (comments, highlights, notes) from PDF documents. Annotations should be extracted along with their type, content, position, and associated page.
deliverables: Docling configuration update in detection_v14_P14 to detect annotations
Alternative YOLO-based annotation detection in specialized_extraction_v14_P15
Update extraction output JSON to include 'annotations' array
Integration tests for full extraction pipeline with annotations
acceptance_criteria: AnnotationExtractor correctly extracts all annotation types (comments, highlights, notes)
Bounding boxes accurate for annotation positions
Output JSON includes well-formed annotations array
Integration test extracts annotations from sample PDF

context_updates: New output contract: extraction JSON will include 'annotations' field
RAG pipeline (TASK_002) depends on this task completing first
Contract update (TASK_003) will formalize the annotations schema
completion_criteria: Output contract updated to include annotations schema
notes: This is part of a cross-pipeline feature. Orchestrator will coordinate with RAG AI (TASK_002) after this completes to ensure RAG pipeline can handle annotation data.
